title: GM pitches $2.8 bln investment in South Korea: officials
text:
GM pitches $2.8 bln investment in South Korea: officials 9:02am EST - 01:34 
General Motors has proposed a $2.8 billion investment over the course of ten years to save its branches in South Korea, according to government officials. This comes after the announcement that one of its four branches in the country was closing down a week before. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
